data.text: Aleke Aƒetɔ la tsɔ eƒe dzikulilikpo
Aƒetɔ la gblẽ Yakob ƒe
Etsɔ dziku helĩhelĩ helã
Ehe eƒe da me abe futɔ ene
Aƒetɔ la zu futɔ eye wòtsrɔ̃ Israel.
Ekaka eƒe nɔƒe abe ale si
Aƒetɔ la gbe nu le eƒe vɔsamlekpui
Yehowa ɖoe kplikpaa be
Eƒe agbowo ɖo do ɖe anyigba
Zion vinyɔnu ƒe dumegãwo nɔ anyi
Avifafa na nu te nye ŋkuwo ŋu,
Wobia wo dadawo be,
Nya ka magblɔ na wò?
Wò nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe ɖeɖefiawo
Ame siwo katã va toa wò mɔ dzi yina la
Wò futɔwo katã ke woƒe nuwo baa ɖe ŋuwò,
Yehowa wɔ nu si wòɖo,
Ameawo ƒe dzi le ɣli dom na Aƒetɔ la.
Fɔ, fa avi le zã me,
“O Yehowa, ɖo ŋku anyi nàkpɔ nu.
“Ɖeviwo kple tsitsiawo siaa
“Abe ale si nèyɔa amewo hena ŋkekenyuiɖuɖu ene la,
